_sText:
TITLE:  CS:S Map - de_company
AUTHOR: Phil Cowey 
	    [OFc] Legato

E-MAIL: philcowey@hotmail.co.uk
FILENAME: de_company.bsp
DATE RELEASED: July 22nd 
NOTES: 2 Bombsites A and B
INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS: 
Put the bsp, nav and .txt files in your maps folder. 
(eg: Steam/steamapps/username/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps)

***Head over to http://www.ofc-gaming.com for our Server IP and come try out the map with us lot!

STORY:
A Small packaging company has been used to smuggle government biological weapons, in order to sell on to highest bidding countries. 


Bomb Target A:
Bombing the Biological weapons stored in the main section of the warehouse so as to put a stop to the illegal government actions


Bomb Target B:
Bombing the records office, so that the terrorists can steal the weapons and remove any trace of them, so that they can be used on the government which means to sell them.

*************************
Credits
*************************
Beta Testing
The OFc Krew:

********Thanks to McClane for the .Nav File**********

****************
Disclamer
****************
Dont decompile this map and try to use it as your own or the OFc Krew will come find you and set fire to you while you sleep.

*************************************
Contruction Notes
Version 4 fixes: - Optimised to best of ability now, players should see an increase in fps, apart from in some areas, bombsite A being rather busy

Version 3 fixes: - Players should now not be able to see through the floor underneath the offices... hopefully
		 - Few texture problems fixed
		 - Players should now not be able to plant the bomb in an area where CTs cant defuse

Version 2 fixes: - Office computers now break up when shot
		 - Lighting issues mostly fixed on areas, a few shadows still remain but you can no longer see 		   through the walls
		 - Clipping issues fixed players should now no longer be able to get on the rooftops
